channel.title: Vorts don't move in Office Complex
channel.description:
The two vortigaunts in bm_c1a2c around that corner always stay at their position. They never move from there. There's an explosive box at the other side of that corner but I can't lure them to the box. I'm sure that in the mod version they walk around the corner after they recognized you.
Position: setpos 1233.471191 442.335419 280.031250; setang -2.651017 102.875595 3.781560
edit:
Same for the vorts at setpos 641.545654 917.381592 11.768929;setang 29.464008 93.031288 0.000000 ![bm_c1a2c0000.jpg|690x500](upload://5MQCtddyCkNMKsxLFRwEymFtbat.jpeg)

item.title: Vorts don't move in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Anschluss
item.description:
The vorts in the bottom of the stairs have the same problem, and maybe the previous ones too.

Read full topic
item.source: Vorts don't move in Office Complex

item.title: Vorts don't move in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
djcj:

The two vortigaunts in bm_c1a2c around that corner always stay at their position. They never move from there. There’s an explosive box at the other side of that corner but I can’t lure them to the box. I’m sure that in the mod version they walk around the corner after they recognized you.

Position: setpos 1233.471191 442.335419 280.031250; setang -2.651017 102.875595 3.781560

edit:

Same for the vorts at setpos 641.545654 917.381592 11.768929;setang 29.464008 93.031288 0.000000

It’s a known issue, it has been reported before. The vorts in that area are constantly staying there.

Also the devs are having difficulty with the issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Vorts don't move in Office Complex
